name: PREE
overview:
PREE Corporation is a new start-up company founded in San Antonio, Texas by a group of local business and engineering graduates. Their focus is to â€œProvide Reliable Energy EverywhereTM.â€

Their flagship product offers smartphone users something they have never had before; true mobility and wireless freedom for their devices. Smartphone battery usage is currently insufficient to meet the demands of todayâ€™s mobile phone users. PREE’s technology is built into an all-in-one protective smartphone case that harnesses energy from wireless transmissions, such as wireless local area networks, and creates a sustainable charge for smartphones.

PREE has developed a ground-breaking technology to charge small portable electronics, such as cell phones, via wireless power transmissions. The product, called the PREEcharge, harvests various inbound signals which include: Bluetooth channels, CDMA transmissions, 802.11a/b/g/n (wireless local area networks), and several other network signals and transmissions. Additionally, PREEâ€™s technology can be combined with solar cells to supplement power needs in various applications and settings.
